channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0145; 03:17AM; 2067 N Mt Olympus Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VBHDEH" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VBHDEH</a>; #HollywoodHillsWest; Firefighters gathered furniture and belongings in the living space below the attic fire to cover with plastic and minimize water damage. Crews cut holes in the roof and breached the ceiling to gain attic access with hose lines from above and below. It took 32 firefighters 44 minutes to extinguish the stubborn flames throughout the attic. No reported injury. Cause under investigation. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T27 T61; CH8; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0145; 02:33AM; 2067 N Mt Olympus Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VBHDEH" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VBHDEH</a>; #HollywoodHillsWest; Single-family home with a confirmed attic fire. Offensive mode.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E97 RA41 RA97 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1635; 11:05PM; 2158 W Slauson Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4b2gi2V" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4b2gi2V</a>; #ChesterfieldSquare; *Corrected Address* LAFD firefighters responded rapidly to the structure fire inside of a one-story commercial building, which shared a wall with a one-story church. Crews forced entry into both occupancies, and extended hose lines inside. Intense flames inside the commercial threatened to spread to the church, but were swiftly stopped by fire attack teams. The church did not sustain any fire damage inside. Ultimately it took 50 firefighters 32 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E15 E205 E21 E221 E226 E233 E266 E295 E34 E46 E5 E57 E66 EA2 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA5 RA66 RA834 RA866 SO1 SQ21 T21 T26 T33 T5 T66 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1635; 10:33PM; 2156 W Slauson Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4b2gi2V" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4b2gi2V</a>; #ChesterfieldSquare; Heavy fire showing from a one-story church and adjacent one-story commercial building. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E233 E266 E34 E46 E57 E66 EM11 RA66 RA834 RA866 SO1 SQ21 T26 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1563; 10:03PM; 12985 N Herrick Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xgykk5" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xgykk5</a>; #Sylmar; Firefighters found a collapsed detached garage with heavy fire showing. Crews deployed handlines to the rear of the two-story home in the front and contained the fire to just the heavily damaged garage. It took 30 firefighters 22 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E275 E287 E298 E7 E75 E91 E98 EM15 RA7 RA75 RA898 RA98 SO1 T75 T87 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1563; 09:41PM; 12989 N Herrick Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4cgKyrJ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4cgKyrJ</a>; #Sylmar; Two-story home with heavy fire in a detached garage to the rear (garage-only has now collapsed).; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA75 RA898 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1909; 11:42PM; 3510 S Broadway St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4aYSWeo" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4aYSWeo</a>; #HistoricSouthCentral; Firefighters established a water supply and quickly deployed fire hoses toward the large outside rubbish fire that was against the side of a one-story commercial building. Thankfully, the first 14 firefighters extinguished the flames prior to any inside involvement of the structure. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 E221 E46 RA14 RA814 SO1 SQ21 T10 T15 T21; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1909; 11:18PM; 3510 S Broadway St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4aYSWeo" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4aYSWeo</a>; #HistoricSouthCentral; Large outside fire threatening a one-story commercial building. Offensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 E221 E46 EM11 RA14 RA814 SO1 SQ21 T10 T15 T21; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Hazardous Materials; INC#0903; 02:40PM; 20750 W Marilla St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4ceULFb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4ceULFb</a>; #Chatsworth; LAFD's Hazardous Materials specialists continue to investigate the identity and source of the vapor cloud coming from an outdoor storage area behind a large one-story commercial building. The 31 occupants of the building have been safely evacuated. Paramedics evaluated eight people. Seven declined hospital transport. One person (approximately 50-year-old male) was transported with only minor medical complaints. PIO Captain Adam Van Gerpen is on scene for media requests. Media please stage south of the incident at Superior Street and Lurline Avenue. ; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AP43 BC10 BC15 BC17 CE83 CM40 CM42 E104 E105 E107 E275 E28 E287 E295 E296 E472 E75 E87 E93 EA2 EM12 EM15 EM17 ER1 ER3 HD75 JT1 JT2 PI2 RA104 RA105 RA106 RA107 RA72 RA87 RA95 RA96 SQ87 SQ95 T75 T87 T95 T96; CH8; 14 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Hazardous Materials; INC#0903; 01:03PM; 20750 W Marilla St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4ceULFb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4ceULFb</a>; #Chatsworth; Firefighters are on scene of a hazardous materials investigation at a large (approximately 200' x 300') one-story commercial building with an unknown vapor coming from behind the building. Firefighters are helping the (approximately 70) occupants of the building to evacuate. They will isolate the hazard area and deny entry until the nature of the vapor cloud is known. No reported patients. There is no known offsite hazard. LAPD Inc #2742.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AP43 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E104 E107 E275 E28 E287 E295 E296 E472 E75 E87 EM12 EM15 EM17 ER1 ER3 HD75 JT1 JT2 RA104 RA106 RA107 RA95 RA96 SQ87 SQ95 T75 T87 T95 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
